description.value:
The Trader
Â 
Ordred is the patron god of merchants and coin. One of the favorite pastimes of followers of Ordred is bartering and keeping a sharp mind and a sharper tongue used to get the best deal they can, whether that be for buying or selling. Ordred strikes a balance between hard work and luck, believing a combination of the two will bring about the best results. In places where Ordred is more popular, it is noticeable that the merchant districts will compete against each other to see who can stay open later and open earlier much to the annoyance of the city guard, who have to eventually force stalls closed.

Edicts

  • Work hard making and getting the best deals
  • Chase the coin

Anathema

  • Settling for a deal (not bartering)

Areas of Concern

  • Wealth
  • Trade
  • Bartering
  • Working hard

LINK
